steps.title: Prepare Required Documents
steps.description: Gather citizenship ID, medical certificate, and photographs

steps.title: Study Traffic Rules
steps.description: Study the traffic rules and road signs for the written test

steps.title: Take Written Test
steps.description: Pass the written examination on traffic rules and road safety

steps.title: Take Practical Test
steps.description: Pass the practical driving test with a licensed instructor

steps.title: Pay Fees and Collect License
steps.description: Pay the license fee and collect your driving license

offices: Road Safety and Transport Authority (RSTA) offices
tips: Study the official traffic manual thoroughly
Practice driving with a licensed driver
Take the test when you feel confident
